Module com.example.project4
Package com.example.project4.RUpizza

Class Order

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.RUpizza.Order
public class Order extends Object
Represents the order for pizzas in the pizza ordering system. Manages a list of pizzas in the order and provides methods to add pizzas to the order. The order is implemented as a singleton to maintain a single instance throughout the application. Uses JavaFX ObservableList to store and manage the list of pizzas in the order.

    • addPizza

      public boolean addPizza(Pizza pizza)
      Adds a pizza to the order. If the added pizza is a speciality pizza, sets its order ID.
      Parameters:
      pizza - The pizza to be added to the order.
      Returns:
      True if the pizza is successfully added to the order, false otherwise.
